prompt: Consider the Marketing Affiliate Agreement between Birch First Global Investments Inc. and Mount Knowledge Holdings Inc.; What is the expiration date of this contract?
expected completion: The expiration date of the contract is the end of the current calendar year, with automatic renewal for successive one-year periods unless terminated according to the provisions in paragraph 18 of the Agreement.

prompt: Consider the Marketing Affiliate Agreement between Birch First Global Investments Inc. and Mount Knowledge Holdings Inc.; What is the renewal term for this contract?
expected completion: The renewal term for this contract is automatically for successive one (1) year periods unless otherwise terminated according to the cancellation or termination provisions contained in paragraph 18 of the Agreement.

prompt: Consider the Marketing Affiliate Agreement between Birch First Global Investments Inc. and Mount Knowledge Holdings Inc.; What is the notice period required to terminate the renewal?
expected completion: The notice period required to terminate the renewal is thirty (30) days written notice.

prompt: Consider the Marketing Affiliate Agreement between Birch First Global Investments Inc. and Mount Knowledge Holdings Inc.; What is the governing law for this contract?
expected completion: The governing law for this contract is the laws of the State of Nevada.

prompt: Consider the Marketing Affiliate Agreement between Birch First Global Investments Inc. and Mount Knowledge Holdings Inc.; Is there an anti-assignment clause in this contract?
expected completion: Yes, there is an anti-assignment clause in the contract.
